wikipedia_page.main: Matthew French (born 8 July 1981) is a British sport shooter. He competed for England in the double trap event at the 2014 Commonwealth Games where he won a silver medal.

response: I also think Matthew French and Peter Wilson should be added to this group.  — Preceding unsigned comment added by 85.255.232.26 (talk) 18:32, 25 January 2015 (UTC)
